text: Cecil Martin Chase (born December 19, 1974 in Lawton, Oklahoma) is a former American football defensive tackle in the National Football League. With the New Orleans Saints he was part of a defensive line nicknamed "The Heavy Lunch Bunch", along with fellow 325-pounders Norman Hand and Grady Jackson. He played college football at the University of Oklahoma. title: Martin Chase
